title: bhaja satatam raghuvIram
sahitya:
bhaja satatam raghuvIram hE mAnasa bhaja jagadIshvaram jAnaki ranjanam


anupallavi

  bhujaga palyanka gajanana rAjana savita anga avatAram shrI rAmam


caraNam    dAsArathihara nipuNam dayAkaram bhAsa kOdaNDakaram suravaram
dashagata rAja pUjita sukumAram dashAna ramaNam dhIra prabhAvam
